laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained normal throughout with a current serum creatinine of 1.1 mg/dL after 10 years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 13 glomeruli with one globally sclerosed; subtle changes at light microscopy, mild increase in mesangial cellularity and matrix, focal thickening of capillary walls; negative for IgG, IgA, IgM, C3, and C1q; electron microscopy showed widespread mesangial expansion by fibrillar collagen.
Demonstrated a frameshift type 2 mutation 238 del A in EXT1 gene
